briefdescription.para: Construction from a bounding polyhedral surface which must be closed, and free of intersections.

detaileddescription.para: The inside of bounding_polyhedron will be meshed.

briefdescription.para: Construction from a polyhedral surface, and a bounding polyhedral surface.

detaileddescription.para: The first polyhedron must be entirely included inside bounding_polyhedron, which must be closed and free of intersections. Using this constructor enables to mesh a polyhedral surface which is not closed, or has holes. The inside of bounding_polyhedron will be meshed.

briefdescription.para: Constructor from a sequence of polyhedral surfaces, and a bounding polyhedral surface.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of ForwardIterator and value type Polyhedron*
iterator for a sequence of pointers to polyhedra
iterator for a sequence of pointers to polyhedra

briefdescription.para: Constructor from a sequence of polyhedral surfaces, without a bounding surface.

detaileddescription.para: The domain will always answer false to is_in_domain() queries.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of ForwardIterator and value type Polyhedron*
iterator for a sequence of pointers to polyhedra
iterator for a sequence of pointers to polyhedra

memberdef.definition: typedef CGAL::AABB_traits_3<IGT, Ins_fctor_primitive> CGAL::Polyhedral_mesh_domain_3< Polyhedron, IGT >::Ins_fctor_traits
memberdef.name: Ins_fctor_traits

memberdef.definition: typedef Side_of_triangle_mesh<Polyhedron, IGT, Default, Ins_fctor_AABB_tree> CGAL::Polyhedral_mesh_domain_3< Polyhedron, IGT >::Inside_functor
memberdef.name: Inside_functor

memberdef.name: Allowed_query_types

memberdef.name: Cached_query

briefdescription.para: The AABB tree: intersection detection and more.
Returns a bounding box of the domain.
Returns the index to be stored in a vertex lying on the surface identified by index.
Returns the index to be stored in a vertex lying in the subdomain identified by index.
Returns the Surface_patch_index of the surface patch where lies a vertex with dimension 2 and index index.
Returns the index of the subdomain containing a vertex with dimension 3 and index index.
The class Polyhedral_mesh_domain_3 implements a domain defined by a simplicial polyhedral surface.

detaileddescription.para: The input polyhedral surface must be free of intersections. It must include (at least) one closed connected component that defines the boundary of the domain to be meshed. Inside this bounding component, the input polyhedral surface may contain several other components (closed or not) that will be represented in the final mesh. This class is a model of the concept MeshDomain_3.

parameterdescription.para: stands for the type of the input polyhedral surface(s), model of FaceListGraph.

stands for a geometric traits class providing the types and functors required to implement the intersection tests and intersection computations for polyhedral boundary surfaces. This parameter has to be instantiated with a model of the concept IntersectionGeometricTraits_3.
